column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I have not one bad thing to say about any of it. I can't
column2: it would be a sin. If you are getting steak
column3: don't even think about looking further than the rib eye. Stroganoff melted in your mouth and fell apart just by looking at it. Corn was so creamy I couldn't even handle it. The pie was hilarious
column4: it was 15 feet high with the whip cream.
